title: Biden camp complains of 'childish antics' after Trump team grabs 'Todos Con Biden' web address
text:
Joe Biden’s presidential campaign is slamming President Trump’s reelection campaign for resorting to “childish antics” after snagging a web address with the same name of the Latino outreach effort Mr. Biden announced Wednesday.

After Mr. Biden, the Democratic presidential front-runner, announced a “national network of Latino supporters” called “Todos Con Biden,” the Trump campaign launched into action and purchased the URL TodosConBiden.com and opened the Twitter account @TodosConBiden to troll potential Biden supporters, ABC News reported.

So far, the Trump campaign-owned website and Twitter handle have been used to slam Mr. Biden and promote the president’s reelection efforts.

The reelection team told ABC News they bought the domain for a “minimal cost” as soon as they realized it hadn’t yet been locked up.

“The Biden campaign continues to be inept with a deeply flawed candidate,” a spokesperson told ABC News. “Latinos are thriving under President Trump and now thanks to the Biden camp, people can find out more about that success at www.todosconbiden.com.”

In response, the Biden campaign said the move by the Trump campaign was “no surprise.”

“It is no surprise that Trump’s Campaign would resort to childish antics like this to take attention away from this President’s appalling record of separating families and using immigrants as scapegoats, fomenting hatred and white supremacy, and trying to take away health care from millions of Americans who need it,” a representative told ABC News.

description: Joe Biden's presidential campaign is slamming President Trump's reelection campaign for resorting to "childish antics" after snagging a web address with the same name of the Latino outreach effort Mr. Biden announced Wednesday.
